Verses: 1 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:
2 nee Isravel Puththirarin Sabai Anaiththodum Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Ungal Dhevanum Karththarumaagiya Naan Parisuththar, Aagaiyaal Neengalum Parisuththaraayirungal.
3 ungalil Avanavan Thanthan Thaaikkum, Thanthan Thagappanukkum Bayandhirukkavum, En Oivunaatkalai Aasarikkavum Kadaveergal; Naan Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar.
4 vikkiragangalai Naadaamalum Vaarppikkappatta Dheyvangalai Ungalukku Undaakkaamalum Iruppeergalaaga; Naan Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar.
5 neengal Samaadhaanapaliyaik Karththarukku Seluththinaal, Adhai Manorchaagamaai Seluththungal.
6 neengal Adhai Seluththugira Naalilum Marunaalilum Adhaip Pusikkavendum; Moondraam Naalmattum Meedhiyaanadhu Akkiniyile Sutterikkappadakkadavadhu.
7 moondraam Naalil Adhil Edhaagilum Pusikkappattaal Aruvaruppaayirukkum; Adhu Angigarikkappadamaattaadhu.
8 adhaip Pusikkiravan Karththarukkup Parisuththamaanadhaip Parisuththakkulaichchalaakkinapadiyaal Avan Than Akkiramaththai Sumandhu, Than Janaththil Iraadhapadikku Aruppundupovaan.
9 neengal Dhesaththin Payirai Arukkumpodhu, Un Vayalin Oraththilirukkiradhaith Theera Arukkaamalum, Sindhikkidakkira Kadhirgalaip Porukkaamalum,

10 un Dhraatchaththottaththile Pin Aruppai Arukkaamalum, Adhile Sindhikkidakkira Pazhangalaip Porukkaamalum, Avaigalai Eliyavanukkum Paradhesikkum Vittuviduvaayaaga; Naan Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar.
11 neengal Kalavu Seyyaamalum, Vanjanaipannaamalum, Oruvarukkoruvar Poi Sollaamalum Irungal.
12 en Naamaththaik Kondu Poiyaanaiyidugiradhinaal, Ungal Dhevanudaiya Naamaththaip Parisuththak Kulaichchalaakkaamalum Iruppeergalaaga; Naan Karththar.
13 piranai Odukkaamalum Kollaiyidaamalum Iruppaayaaga; Koolikkaaranudaiya Kooli Vidiyarkaalammattum Unnidaththil Irukkalaagaadhu.
14 sevidanai Nindhiyaamalum, Kurudanukku Munne Thadukkalai Vaiyaamalum, Un Dhevanukku  Bayandhiruppaayaaga; Naan Karththar.
15 nyaayavisaaranaiyil Aniyaayam Seyyaadhirungal; Siriyavanukku Mugadhaatchiniyam Seyyaamalum, Periyavanudaiya Mugaththukku Anjaamalum, Needhiyaagap Piranukku Nyaayantheerppaayaaga.
16 un Janangalukkulle Angumingum Kolsollith Thiriyaayaaga; Piranudaiya Raththappazhikku Utpadavendaam; Naan Karththar.
17 un Sagodharanai Un Ullaththil Pagaiyaayaaga; Piranmel Paavam Sumaraadhapadikku Avanai Eppadiyum Kadindhu Kollavendum.
18 pazhikkuppazhi Vaangaamalum, Un Janappuththirarmel Poraamaikollaamalum, Unnil Nee Anbukooruvadhupol Piranilum Anbukooruvaayaaga; Naan Karththar.

19 en Kattalaigalaik Kaikkolveergalaaga; Un Miruga Jeevangalai Verujaadhiyode Poliyavidaayaaga; Un Vayalile Vevveru Vagaiyaana Vidhaigalaik Kalandhu Vidhaiyaayaaga; Sanal Noolum Kambalinoolum Kalandha Vasthiraththai Uduththaadhiruppaayaaga.

20 oruvanukku Adimaiyaanaval Oru Purushanukku Niyamikkappattavalaayirundhu, Mutrilum Meetkappadaamalum Thannichchaiyaai Vidappadaamalumirukka, Avalode Oruvan Samyogamaai Sayanampanninaal, Avargal Kolaiseyyappadaamal, Adikkappadavendum; Aval Suyaadheenamullaval Alla.
21 avan Than Kutranivaaranapaliyaai Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalile Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Oru Aattukkadaavaik Konduvarakkadavan.
22 adhinaale Aasaariyan Avan Seydha Paavaththinimiththam Avanukkaagak Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Paavanivirththi Seyyakkadavan; Appozhudhu Avan Seydha Paavam Avanukku Mannikkappadum.

23 neengal Andha Dhesaththil Vandhu, Pusikkaththakka Kanigalaith Tharugira Palavidha Marangalai Naattinapinbu, Avaigalin Kanigalai Viruththasedhanamillaadhavaigalendru Ennuveergalaaga; Moondru Varusham Adhu Pusikkappadaamal, Viruththasedhanamillaadhadhaai Ungalukku Ennappadavendum.
24 pinbu Naalaam Varushaththile Avaigalin Kanigalellaam Karththarukkuth Thudhiseluththugiradharketra Parisuththamaayirukkum.
25 aindhaam Varushaththile Avaigalin Kanigalaip Pusikkalaam; Ippadi Avaigalin Palan Ungalukkup Perugum; Naan Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar.
26 yaadhondraiyum Raththaththudan Pusikkavendaam. Kurikelaamalum, Naalpaaraamalum Iruppeergalaaga.
27 ungal Thalaimayirai Sutri Odhukkaamalum, Thaadiyin Orangalaik Kaththarikkaamalum,
28 seththavanukkaaga Ungal Sareeraththaik Keerikkollaamalum, Adaiyaalamaana Ezhuththukkalai Ungalmel Kuththikkollaamalum Iruppeergalaaga; Naan Karththar
29 dhesaththaar Vesiththanampanni Dhesamengum Muraikedaana Paavam Niraiyaadhapadikku Un Kumaaraththiyai Vesiththanampanna Vidugiradhinaale Parisuththak Kulaichchalaakkaayaaga.
30 en Oivunaatkalai Aasariththu, En Parisuththa Sthalaththaikkuriththu Bayabakthiyaayiruppeergalaaga; Naan Karththar.
31 anjanam Paarkkiravargalai Naadi, Kurisollugiravargalaith Thedaadhirungal; Avargalaale Theettuppadavendaam; Naan Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar.
32 naraiththavanukku Munbaaga Ezhundhu, Mudhirvayadhullavan Mugaththai Ganampanni, Un Dhevanukku Bayappaduvaayaaga; Naan Karththar.
33 yaadhoru Anniyan Ungal Dhesaththil Ungalode Thanginaal, Avanai Sirumaippaduththavendaam.

34 ungalidaththil Vaasampannugira Anniyanai Sudhesipola Enni, Neengal Ungalil Anbukoorugiradhupola Avanilum Anbukooruveergalaaga; Neengalum Egipthudhesaththil Anniyaraayirundheergale; Naan Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar.
35 nyaayavisaaranaiyilum, Alavilum, Niraiyilum, Padiyilum Aniyaayam Seyyaadhiruppeergalaaga.

36 sumuththiraiyaana Tharaasum, Sumuththiraiyaana Niraikallum, Sumuththiraiyaana Marakkaalum Sumuththiraiyaana Padiyum Ungalukku Irukkavendum; Naan Ungalai Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Purappadappannina Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar.
37 aagaiyaal Ennudaiya Kattalaigal Yaavaiyum Ennudaiya Nyaayangal Yaavaiyum Kaikkondu, Avaigalinpadi Nadakkakkadaveergal; Naan Karththar Endru Sol Endraar .
